summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Nintendo 3DS Custom Theme preview page for 'iiSU White UI'. All core functionality working perfectly including backend APIs, frontend UI, download integration, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Backend /api/health endpoint returns 200 with correct response
Backend /api/download endpoint returns 200 with application/zip content-type
Static assets (top.png, bottom.png, preview.png) serve correctly with image content-type
Page loads with 'iiSU White UI' title in header
Top screen image (412x240) displayed in bezel frame with correct label
Bottom screen image (320x240) displayed in bezel frame with correct label
Combined preview image displayed with correct label
Download button styled with accent color #7C8CFF, rounded corners, shadow
Download button hover effect adds glow class and visual effects
Download button triggers file download with correct filename 'iiSU_White_UI.zip'
Metadata card displays theme name, version, compatibility, author, palette swatches
Footer text displayed with expected content
Mobile responsiveness working - all elements visible and accessible
No error messages found on page
